title: Legislation from Summer Lee, Democratic colleagues would combat discriminatory AI
description: Artificial intelligence is transforming the world, one algorithm at a time. U.S. Rep. Summer Lee, D-Swissvale, wants to make sure those algorithms don’t violate people’s civil rights. Lee and three of her Democratic colleagues in the House are introducing a bill that would aim to prevent companies from using discriminatory

title: Amazon rushes out latest AI chip to take on Nvidia, Google
description: Amazon.com Inc.'s cloud unit raced to get the latest version of its artificial intelligence chip to market, renewing efforts to sell hardware capable of rivaling products from Nvidia Corp. and Google.
content:
(Bloomberg/Matt Day) — Amazon.com Inc.’s cloud unit raced to get the latest version of its artificial intelligence chip to market, renewing efforts to sell hardware capable of rivaling products from Nvidia Corp. and Google.

title: Obstetricians in NYC first to use FDA-approved AI tool that enhances fetal screenings for congenital heart defects
description: Doctors in the Raquel and Jaime Gilinski Department of Obstetrics, Gynecology and Reproductive Science at Mount Sinai have become the first in New York City to implement an artificial intelligence (AI) tool that enhances ultrasounds on a large scale—resulting in earlier detection and better care for babies and families.

title: Amazon to use Nvidia tech in AI chips, roll out new servers
description: Amazon's AWS cloud computing unit on Tuesday said it will adopt key Nvidia technology in future generations of its artificial intelligence computing chips as the firm ramps up efforts to get major AI customers using its services.
content:

title: OpenAI takes stake in Thrive Holdings in latest enterprise AI push
description: CHATGPT-MAKER OpenAI has taken a stake in Thrive Holdings as part of a partnership to embed artificial intelligence into traditional industries such as accounting and IT services, the companies said on Monday.

title: Apple AI chief leaving as iPhone maker plays catch-up
description: SAN FRANCISCO, California — Apple on Monday said the head of its artificial intelligence team is stepping down, and the effort is to be led by a veteran engineer from Google and Microsoft.

title: Chinese tech giants rush to capture emerging smart glasses market
description: ARTIFICIAL intelligence (AI) glasses have emerged as one of the most popular devices at tech and trade fairs over the past year. Several exhibitors said visitors are increasingly willing to stop, try on different models, and ask about specific functions ― a shift that signals consumer interest moving from novelty to practicality.
